Reference

All functions

CCDr-package

Toolbox to extend the Complex Crises Database

IMF_docs_urls

dataset containing the urls of the documents extracted from IMF archives

ccdr.corpus()

Aggregate pdf files into list of characters

ccdr.lexicon()

Lexicon of economic crisis

ccdr.lexicon_details()

Provide the keywords associate to the name of the category

ccdr.pages()

Look for the presence of the targetword into a character string Provide list of files and return summary of counts of occurence of the target world

ccdr.sentences()

From a corpus (collection documents), returns the sentences where keyword detected and respective keyword

ccdr.tf()

Compute the term freqeuency matrix for each document in the corpus the function creates a table counting the occurence of the words in the vector of keywords and provide a table with the number of occurence, name of the file that is the name of each document in the corpus

ccdr.tfs()

vectorize the function tf() to be able to pass a list of names of keywords keyword_list is a list containing the names of different groups of keywords that have a vector of words to look into.

ccdr.tfs.update()

Updates the tf-indexes without repeating full extraction

run.ccdr.tfs()

Compute the tf matrix for a corpus given in a list format,

scrap.ccdr.files()

download pdf documents download from a a dataframe containing the url of the files the pdf of interest

scrap.ccdr.tfs()

run the term frequency matrix on the list of urls provided as parameter.
